::Zeus/Rex::

Zeus grins evilly, jumping back up after falling from Hot Rod's trip. 
"Goodbye, Maximal," he says evilly, taking out a gun and aiming it at Hot 
Rod's head.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex's eyes widen as he sees the encounter between Zeus and Hot Rod. The last 
thing they needed was another dead Maximal! He jumps at Zeus, swinging a 
powerful fist.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zeus chuckles as his finger begins to press the trigger. He was going to let 
this Maximal wait agonizingly for death. "I'm sure y-"

Rex's fist suddenly replaces Zeus' head, the head flying off and bouncing a 
few times. Zeus' decapitated body falls to the ground.

"You allright?" Rex asks Hot Rod, looking down at him.
